column3: Just been on one of their Randonees. This is exactly what it's like and what Ben says he means and lives. Best experience ever.
I love rides where I have to work out where to fill my own bidon. The town potable fountain. The farm house. The mountain spring. That's freedom.
2 minutes, that's it? Mavic's videos are so much better. I know you're just pimping the clothing line but really you can afford to do longer videos.
I rode with Ben during the Rapha Cycling Club summit in California. He paced me back to the group after I got a flat tire. He's great guy.
